title: If you're looking for good sleep for a long hour
body: I have been facing issues with insomnia, migraines, and neck pain for a long time, and as an IT employee, sleep is a bigger issue in our lives. So I was looking for a pillow so I could sleep for long hours, but all of them are either expensive or have bad reviews. Then I found it. The first night it was uncomfortable for 2-3 hours to adjust, but then boom! I slept for 6-7 hours. After waking up, I didn't even feel any pain in my neck or have a heavy head. Just go for it if you want good, deep sleep; this pillow will never disappoint you. Honest review after one week.
